item.title: Millions of Americans expected to lose health coverage over the next decade
item.description: In the Rio Grande Valley of south Texas, 1 in 3 people already lack health insurance. That's expected to get worse as President Trump's spending cuts ...

item.title: Is it the magnesium or the massage? The facts about magnesium lotion for sleep
item.description: Social media influencers claim that using lotion with magnesium promotes sleep. But there's little evidence magnesium taken in this way is effective.
